title: Officially Online!
head:
<title>Officially Online!</title>
<meta name="twitter:title" content="Officially Online!">
<meta name="twitter:description" content="First blog post ever.">
<meta property="og:type" content="article">
<meta property="og:description" content="First blog post ever.">
<meta property="og:title" content="Officially Online!">
<meta name="robots" content="index, follow">
<meta name="keywords" content="ishowspeed, ishowspeedy, darren watkins">
<meta name="description" content="First blog post ever.">
content:
This is an unofficial blog dedicated to news related to iShowSpeed.


This website is ad-free and only has a Twitter account. I am hosting it using GitHub Pages. You are welcome to copy and rebrand the blog, though I will not provide instructions.

title: IShowSpeed's South East Asia Tour: Country List
head: <title>IShowSpeed's South East Asia Tour: Country List</title> <meta name="twitter:title" content="IShowSpeed's South East Asia Tour: Country List"> <meta name="twitter:description" content="Here is a list of the possible countries he may visit during the tour."> <meta property="og:type" content="article"> <meta property="og:description" content="Here is a list of the possible countries he may visit during the tour."> <meta property="og:title" content="IShowSpeed's South East Asia Tour: Country List"> <meta name="robots" content="index, follow"> <meta name="keywords" content="ishowspeed, ishowspeedy, darren watkins"> <meta name="description" content="Here is a list of the possible countries he may visit during the tour.">
content:
IShowSpeed is currently on a Southeast Asia tour. Here are the countries he is most likely to visit and those he has completed:

  • Thailand
  • Philippines
  • Malaysia
  • Vietnam
  • Cambodia
  • Indonesia
  • Singapore

The tour began on September 9th. He has currently completed Thailand, the Philippines, and Vietnam.

title: Speed hits 30 million subscribers in Cambodia.
head:
<title>Speed hits 30 million subscribers in Cambodia.</title>
<meta name="twitter:title" content="Speed hits 30 million subscribers in Cambodia.">
<meta name="twitter:description" content="IShowSpeed hits 30 million subscribers while streaming in Cambodia.">
<meta property="og:title" content="Speed hits 30 million subscribers in Cambodia.">
<meta property="og:description" content="IShowSpeed hits 30 million subscribers while streaming in Cambodia.">
<meta name="description" content="IShowSpeed hits 30 million subscribers while streaming in Cambodia.">
content: Congratulations to iShowSpeed for hitting 30 million subscribers in Cambodia! Gaining 200 thousand subscribers in a day.
